scripts.build:copy:src: shx mkdir -p add-on/dist && shx cp -R add-on/src/* add-on/dist
scripts.build:js: browserify -p prundupify -t browserify-css -t [ browserify-package-json --global ] add-on/src/background/background.js add-on/src/options/options.js add-on/src/popup/browser-action/index.js add-on/src/popup/quick-upload.js add-on/src/pages/proxy-acl/index.js -p [ factor-bundle -o add-on/dist/background/background.js -o add-on/dist/options/options.js -o add-on/dist/popup/browser-action/browser-action.js -o add-on/dist/popup/quick-upload.js -o add-on/dist/pages/proxy-acl/proxy-acl.js ] -o add-on/dist/ipfs-companion-common.js
scripts.watch:js: watchify -p prundupify -t browserify-css -t [ browserify-package-json --global ] add-on/src/background/background.js add-on/src/options/options.js add-on/src/popup/browser-action/index.js add-on/src/popup/quick-upload.js add-on/src/pages/proxy-acl/index.js -p [ factor-bundle -o add-on/dist/background/background.js -o add-on/dist/options/options.js -o add-on/dist/popup/browser-action/browser-action.js -o add-on/dist/popup/quick-upload.js -o add-on/dist/pages/proxy-acl/proxy-acl.js ] -o add-on/dist/ipfs-companion-common.js -v
scripts.docker-build: docker run -it --rm --name ipfs-companion-build -v "$PWD":/src -w /src node:9.4.0-alpine npm run yarn-build
scripts.docker-test: docker run -it --rm --name ipfs-companion-test -v "$PWD":/src -w /src node:9.4.0-alpine npm test
